mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALARY (SALARY_ID, EMP_ID, SALARY_DATE, AMOUNT, STORE_ID, WORKTIME, BANKACCOUNT, SALARY) VALUES (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMM'), CONCAT('_', emp_seq.currval)), emp_seq.currval, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMM'), 0, #{store_id}, #{worktime}, #{bankaccount}, #{salary})
mapper.select: SELECT SALARY.SALARY_ID, EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID, EMPLOYEE.EMP_NAME, SALARY.WORKTIME, SALARY.BANKACCOUNT, SALARY.SALARY, SALARY.SALARY_DATE, SALARY.AMOUNT FROM EMPLOYEE, SALARY WHERE EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID = SALARY.EMP_ID AND EMPLOYEE.STORE_ID = #{param1} AND TO_CHAR(SALARY.SALARY_DATE, 'yyyyMM') = #{param2} ORDER BY EMPLOYEE.EMP_ID
